channel.title: Dancing on Robert Duchey
channel.description: Recent content in Dancing on Robert Duchey

item.title: Dancing
item.description: I’ve never liked dancing. There are many artforms I can appreciate. I can sit through a three hour opera, standing in the cheap seats with the surtitles displayed on a little screen below. I can watch a black and white French movie from the 1940s. Over the course of several months I read Infinite Jest — the epically long novel by the late David Foster Wallace — and let me tell you that book is a tough read, if for no other reason than it’s just so damned long.
